segments.text: I was trying to find the class on preparing for interviews .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You have found your way to the interview class . Please come in !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am so happy I found this class because I was really nervous about my upcoming interview .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: When we go into an interview , what do you think our first consideration should be ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Our dress and grooming are probably the first thing an interviewer judges us by .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Friendliness and a good attitude are also very important .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , and they help establish a friendly tone for the rest of the interview .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The interviewers always are interested in what you ask them about their company .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What else should I be thinking about ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Be yourself and be honest . Simply answer the questions put to you .
segments.speaker: S2
